main_definition: Expanded refers to the act of increasing in size, scope or detail; it can also mean enriched with additional information or context.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Increasing in physical size or volume
meanings_and_examples.example: The balloon began to expand as more air was blown into it.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Making something larger or more comprehensive
meanings_and_examples.example: The teacher expanded the class discussion by introducing new topics related to the subject.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Adding details, explanations, or information to a text or speech
meanings_and_examples.example: The journalist provided an expanded version of the news story with additional quotes and background information.
